nodes.title: Updated GLSurfaceViewCupcake to GLSurfaceView from Android 4.3 (API 18) so to properly support onAttachedToWindow and onDetachedFromWindow
Images are flipped in Particle Editor preview window
Use epsilon for zeroValue comparison too.
Ensure begin() is called when the time has been set to a value other
Added method to draw triangle with coloured corners
fixed Sprite.set(Sprite) so that it now also copies regionWidth and regionHeight
Added Accelerometer Input Processor for android
Fix for generating jni interface for native function with a Object[].
Possible fix for ParticleEffect shows unmodified sprite on the first run
Added a new method to get the angle and axis
Override equals and hashCode on FileHandle
Added new constructor and setter for Vector3
ObjectSet and IntSet: some shortcuts for empty sets
Added a void circle builder (circleLine) to create a simple circle line
Add getter for TiledMap (width, height, tilewidth, tileheight)
Bits optimization: No need to loop 64 bits if word is known to be 0
monster insertion of Apache license headers
add Apache headers to new files

Add support to GWT for GlGetInteger, glGetFloat and glGetString. Fix square packing for TexturePacker

Fixed setting previousScrollFocus in Dialog class

Extend GWT ReflectionCache with types used for Array.of

add setFlip, getFlipX, getFlipY and tracking of flip state to Sprite.java
